page.title: 10THE NEW FLAXLEY ESTATE
page.content: The new estate is open plan in design with the houses constructed of red brick with tiled roofs.There are a variety of street plans ranging from crescents to very complicated curves and twists of the roads with many paths and snickets joining each block. Some of the houses are privately owned and some are council owned.Our back gardens are fenced off and private, although they are quite small.The coal bunker is just outside the back door.Some people have built greenhouses and sheds and a few grow vegetables. On some of the side streets away from the main roads young children play in the road on tricycles,bicycles and toy cars.Cars have to drive through very carefully.There is a small park were older children can play.
